nodes.text: Skragg was a Weequay female pirate captain who led the Ohnaka Gang during the time of the Galactic Empire. When the Rebel Alliance transport Spirit of Jedha became stranded at Terminus, Skragg and the Ohnaka Gang attacked the vessel. The bounty hunter Beilert Valance, as a favor to Lieutenant Kondra of the Rebellion, attempted to rescue the Spirit of Jedha, and the Ohnaka Gang fired upon his starship, the Broken Wing.
